titles.title: To correct the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit P16.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 113-703.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 534.

bill.summary: Revises the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit P16 in Florida.
